Interface CH.ifa.draw.framework.DrawingChangeListener

public interface interface DrawingChangeListener
extends EventListener
Listener interested in Drawing changes.

drawingInvalidated(DrawingChangeEvent)
Sent when an area is invalid
drawingRequestUpdate(DrawingChangeEvent)
Sent when the drawing wants to be refreshed

drawingInvalidated 
 public abstract void drawingInvalidated(DrawingChangeEvent e)
Sent when an area is invalid

drawingRequestUpdate 
 public abstract void drawingRequestUpdate(DrawingChangeEvent e)
Sent when the drawing wants to be refreshed
